objects.text:
• Premium Space Gray Aluminum
• High-Resolution Retina Display
• Scratch-Resistant Glass Screen
• Comfortable Sport Band Design

product_details.name: Apple Watch - Elegant Fire Flower Face Edition | Premium Smart Timepiece
product_details.description:
• Stunning Fire Flower watch face design with dynamic golden hues
• Premium Space Gray aluminum case with sleek black finish
• High-resolution Retina OLED display for vibrant visuals
• Durable scratch-resistant glass screen
• Comfortable and lightweight black sport band
• Water-resistant design for everyday use
• Digital crown for precise navigation
• Customizable watch face complications
• Perfect blend of style and smart technology
• Compatible with all Apple Watch features and apps

banner_details:
This banner showcases a luxury smartwatch with a sleek and modern aesthetic. The background is a deep black gradient (#151515 to #0A0A0A) with subtle circular graphics that add dimension and interest. The headline text layer ("heading") is bold and white, placed prominently at the top. Directly beneath it, the subheading ("subheading") uses a serif font in a warm golden tone (#E6A54D) for emphasis. Key product features are listed in a clean sans-serif font ("description") in white, enhancing clarity. The price ("price") is highlighted in gold, supported by a soft-rounded button ("cta_background") with a "SHOP NOW" text layer ("cta") in high contrast black. A central product image ("product_image") on the right offers a striking visual focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #151515
- Charcoal: #0A0A0A
- Gold Ochre: #E6A54D
- Burnt Amber: #D98F29
- Pure White: #FFFFFF
- Deep Gray: #0D0D0D
- Button Text Black: #000000
product_color: The product image of the smartwatch showcases a sleek, modern aesthetic built on a minimalistic and bold color palette. Dominant tones include matte **black (#0A0A0A)** for the strap and bezel, which provides a neutral yet powerful base. The watch face features a dynamic, molten design blending shades of **deep amber (#C87E4F)**, **bronze (#8B4C2B)**, and **golden yellow (#FFD36A)**. These warm tones contrast beautifully against the black, creating a compelling glow effect. The sharp, white-hued hands (**#F7F7F7**) stand out clearly against the darker background. These colors can be used to create a sophisticated, high-tech banner with a dramatic flair.
